All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Animal
Parent class of cow, pig, chicken, sheep; contains methods for general actions like increasing/decreasing health/happiness
AnimalMarket
Animal Market; cows, chicken, sheep, and pig are bought here
AnimalMarketTest
Tests Animal Market Class
AnimalTest
Tests class Animal
Chicken
Chicken class, extends Animal
Cow
Cow animal type, extends Animal
Crop
Class Crop takes a String "crop" (e.g.
CropMarket
Crop Market; where crops (Avocado, Corn, Wheat, Potato, Apple, Carrot) are bought
CropMarketTest
Tests class CropMarket
CropTest
Tests class Crop
DesertFarm
Desert farm; extends Farm
EndGameScreen
End game screen, shows farm name, game duration, money earnt, and score
Farm
Contains methods for adding/removing farm animals and money Also contains the farm's animal list, and crop list
Farmer
Farmer object, simple as it contains only farmer name and age
FarmerTest
Tests class Farmer
GameEnvironment
Main class of the game, contains methods for every main action able to be performed by the farmer as well as initialising all the other classes required
GameEnvironmentTest  
MainScreen
Main screen of the game, hub for all actions
MountainFarm
Mountain farm; subclass of farm
Pig
Pig class, subclass of Animal
PlainsFarm
Plains farm class; subclass of Farm
PopUp
Multi use popup dialog (used mostly for errors)
Sheep
Sheep class, subclass of Animal
StartGameScreen
Setup Screen class, gets inititial input from user
SwampFarm
Swamp farm class; subclass of Farm
TestFarm  
ToolMarket
Contains all methods associated with buying items from the tool market
ToolMarketTest
Tests class ToolMarket on logic
ViewAnimalMarket
Animal Market dialog class
ViewCropMarket
Crop market GUI dialog
ViewFarm
View the farm crops and animals
ViewFarmMoney
View farm money
ViewTendToCrops
Choose which crop to tend to
ViewToolMarket
View tool market, allows buying of utility items
